sns_toolbox.design.design_utilities¶

Functions which are used within the design subpackage, but may not be necessary for the end user.

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

valid_color(color: str = None) → bool

Check if a given color is within the standard svg set.

set_text_color(color: str = None) → str

Set the text color to white or black given a valid color string.

Attributes¶

SETOFVALIDCOLORS

Set of standard SVG color names.

COLORSWHITETEXT

Set of background colors which work better with white text for improved visibility.
sns_toolbox.design.design_utilities.SETOFVALIDCOLORS¶

Set of standard SVG color names.

sns_toolbox.design.design_utilities.COLORSWHITETEXT¶

Set of background colors which work better with white text for improved visibility.

sns_toolbox.design.design_utilities.valid_color(color: str = None) → bool¶

Check if a given color is within the standard svg set.

Parameters:

color (str, optional) – Desired color, default is None.

Returns:

True if it is a valid color, false if not.

Return type:

bool

sns_toolbox.design.design_utilities.set_text_color(color: str = None) → str¶

Set the text color to white or black given a valid color string.

Parameters:

color (str, optional) – Background color, default is None.

Returns:

Text color based on background color.

Return type:

str
